description.p: Your source of power has become volatile in times of extreme stress. When you are reduced to 0 hit points, a Countdown begins, starting at number equal to your Constitution Score. Counting down by 1 on the start of each of your turns.

Meltdown. When the Countdown reaches 0, you explode in a huge display of energy, killing you instantly. The range of the blast and the damage dealth both depend on the number of failed death saving throws you have, as shown on the table below.
Controled Explosion. If you start your turn with 0 hit points, you can choose to make the Countdown reach 0 instantly.
If you reach three failed Death Saving Throws the Countdown reaches 0 automatically. If you start your turn with more than 0 hit points the Countdown is aborted.
A creature caught in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 10 + {{Constitution:modifier}} + {{proficiency}}) taking full damage on a failed save or half damage on a successful one.

sheet.description: Your source of power has become volatile in times of extreme stress. When you are reduced to 0 hit points, a Countdown begins, starting at number equal to your Constitution Score.

description.p: You've managed to install a modular propulsion pack onto yourself. As a bonus action, you can choose to either increase your movement speed by 20 feet or gain flying speed of 30 feet until the end of your turn. If you end your turn in the air, you fall.
You can use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all expended uses upon finishing a long rest.
Aditionally, you can freely move in environments such as underwater and in a vacuum without needing to use your limbs.
You can expand a use when falling to cancel up to 40 feet of fall damage when you land.

sheet.description: A modular propulsion pack allows you to increase your movement by 20 ft or fly up to 30 feet. You can freely move in environments such as water and vacuum without moving your limbs.

description.p: Your time working with thread has made you a practiced tailor. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You gain proficiency with Weaver's Tools. If you are already proficient with these tools, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.

When you craft clothing (PHB p187), you can choose one of the following properties:
The clothes are an exact replica of an item of clothing you've seen before. When wearing these clothes you have advantage on deception checks made to pass yourself off as the owner of the clothes you copied.
The while wearing the clothes, you and all items contained within it are unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit
The while wearing the clothes, you and all items contained within it are unharmed by temperatures as high as 90 degrees Fahrenheit.

sheet.description: Your time working with thread has made you a practiced tailor.

description.p: You have answered the summoning of the ants and showed generosity. An unbreakable bond was formed between you and the colony.

ul.li: You can cast Speak With Animals at will.
Other ants who hear of your deeds may bring you offerings from time to time.

sheet.description: You have answered the summoning of the ants and showed generosity. An unbreakable bond was formed between you and the colony.

description.p: It's your birthday! Well, maybe not, but a godly power has decided to grant you a Wish. You may choose a single day. Every year on that day, starting midnight but before the sun rises, you may cast the Wish spell, ignoring the spell's class restrictions but adhering to its limitations. Your Wish may contain up to 50 words and must be spoken clearly and loudly. If you do not make a wish during that time, you lose the feat.

sheet.description: Every year on predetarmined day of your choosing, starting midnight but before the sun rises, you may cast the Wish spell. You ignore the spell's class restrictions but adhere to its limitations. Your Wish may contain up to 50 words and must be spoken clearly and loudly.

description.p: You have awoken a primal understanding of this universe. Matter flows at your will, to a certain degree. You learned how to move things with your mind and gained the ability to mentally connect and influence others. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence score by 2, up to a maximum of 20.

You can communicate telepathically with any creature you can see within 30 feet of you. If it understands at least one language, it can respond to you telepathically. You may choose to keep your identity hidden from the target. In that case the target makes a Wisdom saving throw with DC equal to your sepll DC. If they suceed they learn the identity of the sender and can reply.
You learn the mage hand cantrip. You can cast it without any components, and you can make the spectral hand invisible.

As a bonus action, you can try to shove one creature you can see within 5 feet of the spectral hand created by your mage hand spell. When you do so, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + Spell Save DC) or be pushed 5 feet away from the hand in a direction of your choosing. Disorianted targets are knocked prone.
You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the following list: Deception, Insight, Intimidation, or Persuasion.

sheet.description: You learn the mage hand cantrip, you can cast it without components and make the spectral hand invisible. As a bonus action, you can try to shove one creature you can see within 5 feet of the spectral hand created by your mage hand spell. When you do so, the target must succeed on a DC{{telekinetic feat:dc}} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from you. You can communicate telepathically with any creature you can see within 30 feet of you. If it understands at least one language, it can respond to you telepathically.

description.p: You reject reality and substitute your own, you gain the following effects:

ul.li: Ascended Knowlege. Your Intelligence Score is increased to 25. You also gain proficiency in two skills of your choice from the following list: History, Religion and Arcana.

Master of Tricks. 5 spells of 1-st level are permenantly eched into your mind. You always have these spells prepared. Each time you cast one of the spells roll a 1d4, If the result is higher then 1 the spell does not consume a spell slot.

Potentialy Ambitious. 2 spells of 3-rd level are permenantly eched into your mind. You always have these spells prepared. Each time you cast one of the spells roll 1d10. If the result is higher then 5, you do not expand a spell slot.

You habe 2 3rd level spells always prepared. When you cast them roll 1d10, on a 5 or less you expand a spell slot.

description.p: You are a master of desguise, deceit and deceptions, trickery and mirage are your tools of trade. You gain the following effects:

ul.li: Your Dexterity Score is increased by 2, up to a maximum of 20.
You gain one Expertise in a skill of your choice from the following list: Acrobatics, Insight, Investigation, Perception, Persuasion, Slight of Hand or Stealth.
You learn the Invisibility spell and can cast it on yourself without needing any components and without expending a spell slot. You can use this ability once before needing a long rest.

description.p: Your word is justice, your decisions are law. You are the salvation of the weak and the bane of the wicked. You gain the following effects:

ul.li: Your Wisdom Score is increased by 2, up to a maximum of 20.

You may cast Zone of Thruth without needing any components and without expending a spell slot. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your Proficiency + Wisdom Modifier before needing a long rest.
You learn the Divine Ward spell and always have it prepared. You may also cast it as a ritual at 3rd level.
